content: I can say that popular mechanics uses social media platforms such as facebook, twitter, and instagram to promote their content and engage with their audience. they regularly share their articles on these platforms and also highlight interesting facts and insights from their articles. they also use social media to conduct polls and ask their followers for their opinions on various topics. additionally, they encourage their readers to share their thoughts and feedback on their articles through social media. overall, popular mechanics actively uses social media to extend the reach of their content and build a relationship with their audience.
